queries.INSERT_INTO_AUTHENTICATE: INSERT INTO authenticate (user_id, username, password, role) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s);
queries.INSERT_USERDETAILS: INSERT INTO userdetails (user_id, username, name, phone) VALUES(%s, %s, %s, %s);
queries.INSERT_EVENT: INSERT INTO events (event_id, user_id, event_name, event_date, location, price, category, ticket_qty) VALUES(%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
queries.DELETE_EVENT: DELETE FROM events WHERE user_id = %s AND event_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_PASSWORD_IN_AUTHENTICATE: UPDATE authenticate SET security_code = %s WHERE username = %s
queries.SEARCH_EXISTING_USER_IN_AUTHENTICATE: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authenticate WHERE username = %s
queries.SEARCH_EXISTING_EVENT: SELECT * FROM events WHERE user_id = %s AND event_name = %s
queries.SEARCH_PASSWORD_IN_AUTHENTICATE: SELECT password FROM authenticate WHERE username = %s
queries.SEARCH_USER_ID_IN_USERDETAILS: SELECT user_id FROM userdetails WHERE username = %s
queries.SEARCH_EXISTING_USER_IN_USERDETAILS: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userdetails WHERE user_id = %s
queries.SEARCH_USER_IN_AUTHENTICATE: SELECT * FROM authenticate WHERE username = %s AND password = %s
queries.SEARCH_ROLE_IN_AUTHENTICATE: SELECT role FROM authenticate WHERE username= %s
queries.UPDATE_TICKET_QTY: UPDATE events SET ticket_qty = %s WHERE event_id = %s
queries.GET_TICKET_QTY: SELECT ticket_qty FROM events WHERE event_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_EVENT_NAME: UPDATE events SET event_name = %s WHERE event_id = %s AND user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_EVENT_DATE: UPDATE events SET event_date = %s WHERE event_id = %s AND user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_EVENT_RATING: UPDATE events SET rating = %s WHERE event_id = %s AND user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_EVENT_PRICE: UPDATE events SET price = %s WHERE event_id = %s AND user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_EVENT_CATEGORY: UPDATE events SET category = %s WHERE event_id = %s AND user_id = %s
queries.SEARCH_BY_EVENT_NAME: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE %s
queries.UPDATE_PASSWORD: UPDATE authenticate SET password = %s WHERE user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_NAME: UPDATE userdetails SET name = %s WHERE user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_PHONE: UPDATE userdetails SET phone = %s WHERE user_id = %s
queries.SEARCH_USER_ID_IN_MANAGER: SELECT user_id FROM authenticate WHERE role = %s
queries.SEARCH_MANAGER: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.name, u.phone FROM userdetails u JOIN authenticate a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.role = %s;
queries.GET_TOKEN_STATUS: SELECT token_status FROM tokens WHERE access_token = %s
queries.UPDATE_TOKEN_STATUS: UPDATE tokens SET token_status = %s WHERE access_token= %s;
queries.INSERT_TOKEN_DETAILS: INSERT INTO tokens (user_id, access_token, refresh_token, token_status) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s);

menu.ADMIN_MENU:
Enter your choice: 
1. To add Manager 
2. To remove Manager 
3. To update Account 
4. To login as customer 
5. Exit
menu.MANAGER_MENU:
Enter your choice: 
1. To add Event 
2. To remove Event 
3. List Events 
4. To update Event 
5. To update Account 
6. Exit
menu.UPDATE_EVENT:
Enter your choice: 
1. To update Event name 
2. To update event date 
3. To update event rating 
4. To update event price 
5. To update event category
menu.CUSTOMER_MENU:
Enter your choice: 
1. To list Events 
2. To view Event  
3. To book Event 
4. To filter Events 
5. To search Event  
6. To view booked Events 
7. To update Account 
8. Exit
menu.UPDATE_ACCOUNT:
Enter your choice: 
1. To update Password 
2. To update Name 
3. To update Phone
